description.zh-cn: 中国维吾尔族政治人物，中国共产党党员，现任中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委常委、统战部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Uyghur ethnicity and a member of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as a Standing Committee member of the CPC Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee and Minister of its United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国政府与欧洲联盟合作创办的世界顶尖商学院。
description.en: A world-class business school co-founded by the Chinese government and the European Union.

zh-cn: 吉通网络通信股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家网络通信公司。
description.en: A network communication company in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家大型国有企业，主营能源、农业、化工、地产、金融等业务。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in China, primarily engaged in businesses such as energy, agriculture, chemicals, real estate, and finance.

description.zh-cn: 曾为中化集团下属公司，伊力扎提·艾合买提江曾在此任职。
description.en: A former subsidiary of Sinochem Group where Ilzat Exmetjan once held a position.

nodes.id: 中国对外经济贸易信托有限公司

en: China Foreign Economy and Trade Trust Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家信托公司。
description.en: A trust company in China.

description.zh-cn: 中化集团旗下的金融业务部门。
description.en: The financial business unit under Sinochem Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国最大的粮油食品企业之一，为中央企业。
description.en: One of China's largest grain, oil, and foodstuff enterprises, a central state-owned enterprise.

description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 新疆维吾尔自治区总工会

zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区总工会
en: Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions

description.zh-cn: 中华全国总工会在新疆维吾尔自治区的地方组织，是该地区各地方总工会和各产业工会全区性组织的领导机关。
description.en: The local organization of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, serving as the leading body for local and industrial trade unions throughout the region.

description.en: The functional department of the CPC Xinjiang Committee responsible for united front work.

description.zh-cn: 中国维吾尔族政治人物，伊力扎提·艾合买提江的前任中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委统战部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Uyghur ethnicity, predecessor of Ilzat Exmetjan as the Minister of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国哈萨克族政治人物，伊力扎提·艾合买提江的前任新疆维吾尔自治区总工会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician of Kazakh ethnicity, predecessor of Ilzat Exmetjan as the Chairman of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions.

nodes.id: 木合亚提·加尔木哈买提

description.en: A Chinese politician of Kazakh ethnicity, successor to Ilzat Exmetjan as the Chairman of the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region Federation of Trade Unions.

description.en: A member of the 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. According to page category information, Ilzat Exmetjan is a member.

description.zh-cn: 伊力扎提·艾合买提江是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Ilzat Exmetjan is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 伊力扎提·艾合买提江毕业于中国人民大学人力资源管理专业。
description.en: Ilzat Exmetjan graduated from Renmin University of China with a degree in Human Resource Management.

description.zh-cn: 伊力扎提·艾合买提江拥有中欧国际工商学院工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Ilzat Exmetjan holds an EMBA from the China Europe International Business School.

description.en: Ilzat Exmetjan succeeded Zumret Obul as the Minister of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Regional Committee.
